hero.subtitle: Tribute to the Queen of Soul
hero.description: A vibrant tribute to the Queen of Soul, carried by 11 passionate musicians and contagious energy.

intro.label: The show
intro.description1: Little Aretha is much more than a simple tribute to the Queen of Soul: it's a musical and emotional experience carried by 11 musicians and backing vocalists, a singer with a radiant personality, an explosive brass section, and an irresistible groove that makes the audience vibrate from the very first notes.
intro.description2: Born from a story of family transmission, Little Aretha pays tribute to Aretha Franklin's immense body of work while bringing a modern, personal and vibrant stage identity.

gallery.label: In concert
gallery.description: Contagious energy, human chemistry and the pleasure of playing together make each concert a unique moment.

video.label: In action
video.description: Discover the energy and passion of Little Aretha on stage.

cta.description: Contact us to organize an unforgettable concert.

hero.label: Biography
hero.description: A vibrant tribute. A sharing. A celebration.

project.description4: – that of Thierry Le Gall (drummer/percussionist) and his son Nolan Le Gall, initiator and co-creator of the project – Little Aretha pays tribute to Aretha Franklin's immense body of work while bringing a modern, personal and vibrant stage identity.
project.description5: It's not about copying, but about
project.highlight3: reinterpreting with respect, passion and contagious energy

experience.label: The show
experience.description: A rare, almost cinematic immersion, allowing the audience to deeply understand and feel the legacy of this exceptional artist.
experience.feature1Description: Artists who have collaborated with big names on the French and international scene, having appeared on The Voice, Nulle Part Ailleurs or major tours.
experience.feature2Description: Between certain songs, a voice tells the story of Aretha Franklin: the key moments of her career, the origins of certain songs, the struggles, the joys, the inspirations.
experience.feature3Description: A screen at the back of the stage projects photos, videos and archives of Aretha Franklin, offering a sensitive and elegant dimension to this musical journey.

team.description2: Human chemistry, musical precision and the pleasure of playing together make each concert a
team.description3: The audience rediscovers Aretha's greatest hits – from gospel to soul, from R&B to the most intense moments of her career – in a

quote.description: After a sold-out premiere at the Dourdan Cultural Center, enthusiastically received, Little Aretha is now preparing to meet audiences throughout France and beyond.
